original_title: Das Zugunglück von Radevormwald – Leben mit der Katastrophe
overview: May 27th, 1971 was a rainy day. In the small town Radevormwald, the world seems to be still in order. But on this day, 46 people die in a train crash, amongst them 41 schoolchildren. Since then, Radevormwald has been connected with one of the worst railway catastrophes of Germany. The touching documentary reconstructs the tragedy and shows how much the event still influences the life in the town until today.
title: Das Zugunglück von Radevormwald – Leben mit der Katastrophe
